requirement_tested: Create a responsive website with a professional layout tailored for small to medium-sized businesses.
user_persona: A small business owner browsing the website on a laptop.
user_goal: To navigate the website easily and find relevant information quickly.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the homepage and notices a clean layout with a header containing the logo, navigation menu, and a contact button. The background is misty rose, and all components are styled in firebrick.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page renders with a full-width header, misty rose background, and firebrick-styled UI components.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Sections
narrative_steps.description: Curious about services, Sarah clicks on the 'Services' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page scrolls smoothly to the services section or loads the dedicated services page.

requirement_tested: Include a homepage introducing software solutions and staffing services with clear value propositions.
user_persona: A potential customer exploring the homepage for business solutions.
user_goal: To understand the value offered by the software and staffing services.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Hero Section
narrative_steps.description: Mike lands on the homepage and sees a hero banner with a headline and subheadline explaining how the company streamlines operations for SMBs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A hero section with background image, headline, and subheadline is displayed prominently.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Value Propositions
narrative_steps.description: He scrolls down and notices three boxes titled 'Custom Software Solutions', 'Expert Staffing Services', and 'Proven Success Stories'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Three value proposition boxes appear with clear, non-technical descriptions.

narrative_steps.title: Learning More
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued, Mike clicks the 'Learn More About Our Services' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the services overview page.

requirement_tested: Add dedicated sections for detailed product and service descriptions.
user_persona: A business manager looking for specific service details.
user_goal: To learn detailed information about available software and staffing services.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Services Page
narrative_steps.description: Lisa navigates to the services page to explore offerings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page displays categorized service cards with icons and brief summaries fetched dynamically.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Service Details
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on a service card labeled 'Custom Software Development'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Card expands or redirects to a standalone page showing full service description.

requirement_tested: Implement an industry news and trends section displaying latest updates in an engaging format.
user_persona: A curious visitor interested in staying updated on tech trends.
user_goal: To browse and read the latest industry news articles.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting News Section
narrative_steps.description: Tom clicks on the 'News' link in the navigation bar to find recent updates.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the '/news' page showing a list of recent articles with headlines and summaries.

narrative_steps.title: Reading an Article
narrative_steps.description: He finds an interesting article and clicks on it to read more.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article opens in a detailed view with full content and optional thumbnail.

requirement_tested: Feature a customer cases and success stories section with real-world examples.
user_persona: A prospect wanting to see real-life success stories.
user_goal: To explore customer case studies and testimonials.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Success Stories
narrative_steps.description: Emma navigates to the 'Success Stories' page to see how others benefited.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Success Stories' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the '/success-stories' page displaying case study cards with company names and challenges.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring a Case Study
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on a case study card for a logistics company.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a case study card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Case study expands or redirects to a page showing the full story including solution and outcome.

requirement_tested: Design all page backgrounds using misty rose color (#FFE4E1).
user_persona: A designer reviewing the website's visual consistency.
user_goal: To verify that all pages use the correct background color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Alex inspects the homepage to confirm the background color.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body background color is set to #FFE4E1 across the entire page.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Other Pages
narrative_steps.description: He navigates to other sections like Services, News, and Contact to ensure uniformity.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page has a consistent misty rose background.

requirement_tested: Style all UI components such as buttons, headers, and links using firebrick color (#B22222).
user_persona: A frontend developer validating UI styling.
user_goal: To confirm all interactive elements are styled with firebrick.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Buttons
narrative_steps.description: Jamie examines the buttons on the homepage to ensure they match the brand style.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect button styles using browser tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons have #B22222 background with white text.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Hover Effects
narrative_steps.description: He hovers over a button to see if there's a visual feedback.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button darkens slightly indicating interactivity.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse content through intuitive navigation menus.
user_persona: A casual visitor exploring the website.
user_goal: To effortlessly navigate through different sections of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on the 'News' link in the sticky navigation bar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'News' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Smoothly scrolls to or loads the news section.

narrative_steps.title: Mobile Navigation
narrative_steps.description: On a mobile device, Riley taps the hamburger icon to open the menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click the hamburger icon on mobile view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation drawer slides out with menu options.

requirement_tested: Integrate a search functionality allowing users to find specific information or products.
user_persona: A user searching for specific information.
user_goal: To locate relevant content using the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Chris notices the search bar in the header and types 'cloud services' into it.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'cloud services' into the search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results page loads showing articles and services related to 'cloud services'.

requirement_tested: Provide a contact form or contact page for visitors to request more information.
user_persona: A potential client wanting to get in touch.
user_goal: To submit a contact form with inquiries.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Patricia goes to the contact page and fills in her name, email, company, and message.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the contact form fields and click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form validates inputs and sends data to backend. A success message is shown.

requirement_tested: Ensure all content is written in clear, easy-to-understand language targeted at non-technical audiences.
user_persona: A non-technical business owner reading website content.
user_goal: To understand the content without confusion.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Homepage Content
narrative_steps.description: David reads the homepage content to understand what the company offers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content is clear, jargon-free, and easy to comprehend.

requirement_tested: Optimize the website for engagement with visually appealing layouts and readable fonts.
user_persona: A user evaluating the website's readability.
user_goal: To experience a visually pleasing and easy-to-read interface.

narrative_steps.title: Assessing Typography
narrative_steps.description: Jordan reviews the font choices and spacing on various pages.
narrative_steps.action: Browse different pages and inspect text layout.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text uses 'Open Sans', sans-serif font with good line spacing and visual hierarchy.

requirement_tested: Set up static file serving for images, stylesheets, and client-side scripts.
user_goal: To ensure static assets load properly.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Assets
narrative_steps.description: Taylor checks if images and stylesheets are loading correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Visit homepage and inspect network tab for asset requests.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Images, CSS, and JS files are loaded from the public directory without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'install:all' script to install frontend and backend dependencies concurrently.
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clones the repository and runs the install script.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend dependencies install simultaneously without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'dev' script to start both frontend and backend servers concurrently.
user_persona: A developer starting the development environment.
user_goal: To launch both servers with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Casey runs the dev script to start working on the project.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend servers start concurrently and are accessible.
